title: Coronavirus: NHS workers' lives at risk over PPE shortages, says BMA
description: The BMA's warning comes as the health secretary reveals 19 NHS workers have died with coronavirus.

title: Aubameyang urged to leave 'failing' Arsenal for 'more ambitious club'
description: Arsenal's Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang needs to "secure a contract with a more ambitious club," according to the president of the Gabon Football Association.

title: Aamir Siddiqi murder: Killing is 'open wound' 10 years on
description: A decade after Aamir Siddiqi's killing, his family appeal for a wanted man to stop running.

title: England wing May to rejoin Gloucester at end of season
description: England wing Jonny May will leave Leicester Tigers to rejoin Gloucester at the end of the 2019-20 season.

title: Ralph Baxter death: Family tribute to 'loving husband'
description: Retired civil servant Ralph Baxter, 74, was attacked while walking his dog in Northamptonshire.

title: 'I thought because I was young it wouldn't affect me'
description: Calum Wishart, 25, warns of his "horrendous experience" with coronavirus that left his life in jeopardy.

title: Katarina Johnson-Thompson: World heptathlon champion shares isolation tips
description: World heptathlon champion Katarina Johnson-Thompson shares her tips on how to maintain motivation while in lockdown with help from her two workout buddies.

title: Coronavirus: 12 ways our life tasks big and small have changed
description: From registering a birth to visits from the bailiff - here are 12 questions you may still be asking.

title: Ben Earl: Saracens & England forward on must-read books for lockdown
description: England and Saracens forward Ben Earl, who has a degree in comparative literature, lists five must-read books for lockdown.

title: Coronavirus: US death toll passes 2,000 in a single day
description: America now has half a million confirmed coronavirus cases but the outbreak may soon begin to level off.

title: Hull City: Angus MacDonald on his cancer, recovery & return to football
description: After being diagnosed with bowel cancer seven months ago, Hull City defender Angus MacDonald discusses his diagnosis, recovery and return to playing.

title: The Papers: Vaccine key to UK exit strategy and 'the lives cut short'
description: Some papers lead on claims restrictive lockdown measures could continue until a vaccine is found.

title: Coronavirus: Rainbow trail success surprises Ipswich mum
description: Crystal Stanley says the rainbows represent "positivity, hope and togetherness" during the pandemic.

title: Coronavirus: World celebrates Easter despite lockdown
description: Across the globe, people are finding innovative ways to celebrate the Christian festival.

title: Final Fantasy 7 Remake: 'This is not just for the players of the original'
description: The original 1997 game sold more than 12 million copies and a 2020 remake has just been released.

title: Coronavirus: Bogus Jeff Bezos message and other misleading stories unpicked
description: Fact-checking the week's most popular dubious stories including a billionaire's fake quote and 5G myths.

title: Week in pictures: 4-10 April 2020
description: A selection of news photographs taken around the world this week.
